entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
